about_the_company: Net2Source Inc. is an award-winning total workforce solutions company recognized for accelerated growth with over 5500+ employees globally and operations in 32 countries. They provide staffing solutions and act as career coaches to consultants.
job_responsibilities: Gathering business requirements and developing functional specifications
Defining test cases and providing user training and support
Working on Basel-related projects in credit risks
Defining and implementing technology solutions for financial institutions
